Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Northwest Highway/Nagle
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Northwest Highway, Devon and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Northwest Highway/Nagle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Nagle, Northwest Highway, Devon and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Northwest Highway/Nagle.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/24th Place
ShortDescription: EB 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Cermak, Kostner, Ogden and Cicero, due to street blockage near Cicero/24th Place.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
